column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: Â Two people suffered injuries after driving a Prius into a road divider
column4: hitting polices and a traffic sign.------The incident occurred at 1:40 am on May 13
column6: along Street 217 in Stung Mean I commune
column8: Phnom Penh.------Witnesses say they saw a black Prius with Phnom Penh license plate 2BD-9200
column9: driven by a male with a woman passenger
column10: speeding along Street 217 in a westbound direction while apparently drunk.------The car hit traffic signal poles and overturned. The driver and passenger were taken to hospital.------After the incident
column11: the car was taken away to await a legal resolution. ------NKD
